text: Is it possible to read a subset of columns into a DataFrame? I see `Arrow.Table("mytable.arrow")[:col1]` in the docs, but this doesn't seem to extend to vectors of symbols. `DataFrame([Arrow.Table("mytable.arrow")[c] for c in [:col1, :col2]])` works but is quite slow as I guess it materializes everything?

elements.text: Is it possible to read a subset of columns into a DataFrame? I see
in the docs, but this doesn't seem to extend to vectors of symbols.
works but is quite slow as I guess it materializes everything?

text: Yeah, the example you show is doing the entire arrow table re-reading for each column which is pretty inefficient

elements.text: Yeah, the example you show is doing the entire arrow table re-reading for each column which is pretty inefficient
